tool.name: Retrieve length-variant reads

param.name: fastq
param.label: Reads with primers removed
param.help: The same input for the tool "Find length variants"

param.name: var
param.label: File listing length variants
param.help: Output from the tool "Find length variants"

tool.help: This tool produces a FASTQ file listing the reads classified as length-variant by the tool *Find length variants*. The length of the in/del is appended to each read header.
